tag_line: Turning Ideas into Reality with Code and Creativity.
intro_tagline: Mission-driven MERN stack developer, passionate about thoughtful UI design, real-time functionality, and building innovative web applications.
subTitle: Solving real-world problems through technology and creativity.
favorites_quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
bio_desc: As a web developer specializing in the MERN stack, I’m passionate about creating impactful, user-friendly applications. From building Writewave, a feature-rich blogging platform, to working on innovative projects like EduVista and personalized news aggregators, I thrive on crafting solutions that make a difference. I'm constantly learning, exploring new technologies, and pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in web development.
